item.title: Multiplayer in bms
item.dc:creator: Roby65
item.description:
Comrade Tiki:

…I see NPCs…

…Do you mean… that this is co-op?!?

How’s player respawn? I’m assuming save/load states don’t work?

You can’t load/save in mp, the best thing you can do is change map to change the part of the game where you are playing (changelevel if you are already playing, otherwise map)
The other npcs are fully working, except that if one player goes ahead and a door closes, you are locked behind and you have to do noclip.

And also achievements can be unlocked by both the players

EDIT: Usually when you die you respawn at the start of the level, and you have to noclip to return to where you were.

Roby

item.title: Multiplayer in bms
item.dc:creator: Roby65
item.description:
It’s simple. (you need the console)

Type in the console:

net_start
maxplayers 4
sv_lan 0
map [map name]

The client, should open the console and type:

connect [ip]

Naturally replace the map name with the real map name (bm_…) and the ip with your ip.
If you get stuck somewhere (very probably) type:

sv_cheats 1
noclip

If you find how to change player model, tell me
SetModel seems not working…

Roby

PS: Also if the second player gets stuck without HEV suit, he needs to write

give item_suit
